verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. As <S%H5492>whirlwinds<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%> <S%H2498>sweep<s%> <S%H935>through<s%>, it cometh from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, from a <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

A <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> is <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto <S%H898>me<s%>; the treacherous man dealeth <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> <S%H7703>destroyeth<s%>. Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, O <S%H5867>Elam<s%>; <S%H6696>besiege<s%>, O <S%H4074>Media<s%>; all the <S%H585>sighing<s%> thereof have I made to <S%H7673>cease<s%>.

Therefore are my <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2479>anguish<s%>; <S%H6735>pangs<s%> have taken <S%H270>hold<s%> upon <S%H6735>me<s%>, as the pangs of a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>: I am <S%H5753>pained<s%> so that I cannot <S%H8085>hear<s%>; I am <S%H926>dismayed<s%> so that I cannot <S%H7200>see<s%>.

My <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8582>fluttereth<s%>, <S%H6427>horror<s%> hath <S%H1204>affrighted<s%> <S%H5399>me<s%>; the twilight that I <S%H2837>desired<s%> hath been <S%H7760>turned<s%> into trembling unto <S%H2731>me<s%>.

They <S%H6186>prepare<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>, they <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H6822>watch<s%>, they <S%H398>eat<s%>, they <S%H8354>drink<s%>: <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H8269>up<s%>, ye princes, <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%>.
For thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>me<s%>, Go, <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman<s%>: let him <S%H5046>declare<s%> what he <S%H7200>seeth<s%>:

and when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> a <S%H7393>troop<s%>, <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs<s%>, a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H2543>asses<s%>, a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%>, he shall <S%H7181>hearken<s%> <S%H7182>diligently<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7182>heed<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%>: O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> upon the <S%H4707>watch-tower<s%> in the <S%H3119>day-time<s%>, and am <S%H5324>set<s%> in my <S%H4931>ward<s%> whole <S%H3915>nights<s%>;

and <S%H935><s%>, behold, here cometh a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>, <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs<s%>. And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5307>Fallen<s%>, <S%H5307>fallen<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and all the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of her <S%H430>gods<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> unto the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

O thou my <S%H4098>threshing<s%>, and the <S%H1121>grain<s%> of my <S%H1637>floor<s%>! that which I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, have I declared unto <S%H5046>you<s%>.

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1746>Dumah<s%>. One <S%H7121>calleth<s%> unto me out of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>? <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>?

The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%>, and also the <S%H3915>night<s%>: if ye will <S%H1158>inquire<s%>, <S%H1158>inquire<s%> <S%H7725>ye<s%>: turn <S%H857>ye<s%>, come.
The <S%H4853>burden<s%> upon <S%H6152>Arabia<s%>. In the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> shall ye <S%H3885>lodge<s%>, O ye <S%H736>caravans<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanites<s%>.

Unto <S%H7125>him<s%> that was <S%H6771>thirsty<s%> they <S%H857>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>; the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> did <S%H6923>meet<s%> the <S%H5074>fugitives<s%> with their <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

For they <S%H5074>fled<s%> away <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>swords<s%>, <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3514>grievousness<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>.

For thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8141>me<s%>, Within a year, according to the <S%H8141>years<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>;

and the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7198>archers<s%>, the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, shall be <S%H4591>few<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, hath spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
